patthana21.39:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.39:5.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.39:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.39:6.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.39:6.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.39:7.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.39:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
